Comments_List: I gained a good picture of interesting contemporary mathematics and the skills that are needed to approach interesting open problems.

I think the course does a wonderful job of what it is supposed to do. A lot of cool topics are presented, and you engage with a specific topic very intensely to give a presentation on it, thus learning a lot about an interesting contemporary piece of mathematics.
This is an incredible course, and a must take for anyone who wants to do analysis!
Stefan is great! I would always recommend taking his classes
Take every class this man ever teaches. Maybe even differential equations.
